sentences.sentence: You are listening to University of Georgia oceanographer Mandy Joye.
sentences.translation: 您听到的是对乔治亚大学海洋学家曼迪·乔伊的采访。

sentences.sentence: The patch was discovered 10 years ago by the oceanographer Charles Moore when he was sailing off Hawaii.
sentences.translation: 该垃圾带由海洋学家查尔斯 摩尔（Charles Moore）在10年前发现的，当时他正驶离夏威夷。

sentences.sentence: That answer comes from biological oceanographer Nancy Rabalais of the Louisiana Universities Marine Consortium.
sentences.translation: 您正在收听的是路易斯安那大学海事协会海洋生物学家南希·拉尔莱的讲话。
